attributes.action: Harsher punishments and jail sentences for Animal abusers
attributes.additional_details:
Animals feel pain as we do. If you disbelieve then watch them as they feed, care and love their young .
Watch them hurt if you take the young away,watch the pain and suffering in their eyes when they are abused and beaten.
See the fear in them when they shake of fright.
But worst of all the see absolute dejection in their face when they have been hurt so much they dont want to go on.
HARSHER PUNISHMENTS AND JAIL SENTENCES MUST BE GIVEN TO ANIMAL ABUSERS.
Please help them and sign this petition, on behalf of your pet who would if they could. Thank you
